label: 上巳節
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The First Snake Banquet on the Third of the Third Month, one of the Five Banquets on the Court calendar, so called because it had originally been held on the first Day of the Snake in the Third Month.  Also called Peach Festival (momo no sekku) (p. 619n). [桃の節句]
